TopicTitle: If you're throttled up more than me, wave as you go by!

Articles.Content:
PS I don't own a Mac, the previous owner did and the logo won't come off!

PPS Just need to find my Catan sticker now... It was in the box until a few weeks ago!

PPPS Your, you're, numpty!
I wouldn't buy that car simply because the apple logo isn't even on straight. It would annoy me knowing that my car is now off balance because of it.

To do:

1. Stick anemometer in tailpipe

2. Weigh car

3. Weigh car and fuel

4. Plug exhaust velocity, dry mass and full mass into rocket equation

5. Obtain bumper sticker proclaiming my car's total frictionless-vacuum delta-V
Why didn't you just cover up the apple sticker with the kerbal one?

*cool stuff*

I'm around your neck of the woods, if I see you I'll flash my mk3 Illuminators !

I'm around your neck of the woods, if I see you I'll flash my mk3 Illuminators !

That's worth some good funds and science! Just don't crash or you will lose rep!

*snip*

Something better maybe?
Eh, not enough space - would look terrible there. Whoever put the apple sticker there is double-stupid for it

Eh, not enough space - would look terrible there. Whoever put the apple sticker there is double-stupid for it

That would be my mother....
I never got the habit of wearing/carrying big company logos around ... intentionally at least.

OP

When I worked at a car dealership I would use a heat gun to remove stickers. I wonder if a hair dyer would work for you apple sticker. for the record I never tried the hair dyer but did use the heat gun.
Heat gun works, but don't hold it on one spot too long, or you'll also burn the paint off.

To do:

1. Stick anemometer in tailpipe

2. Weigh car

3. Weigh car and fuel

4. Plug exhaust velocity, dry mass and full mass into rocket equation

5. Obtain bumper sticker proclaiming my car's total frictionless-vacuum delta-V

your car has an air-breathing engine. Vacuum delta-V=0. No math needed.
I'm sure there is a mod to fix the apple logos orientation. Have you tried the vehicle with NEAR or FAR?

I'm sure there is a mod to fix the apple logos orientation. Have you tried the vehicle with NEAR or FAR?

There is this mod called Android that could fix that Apple sticker see......

your car has an air-breathing engine. Vacuum delta-V=0. No math needed.

Nah, just get the passengers to blow into the intakes and you'll be set.
Hmmm...could a car with nitrous drive on the moon?

Hmmm...could a car with nitrous drive on the moon?

Unlikely, as it's still an air-breathing engine. N2O simply allows more efficient combustion without changing the compression ratio (i.e. more thrust per unit of fuel) but I don't think it could replace air.

That said, nitrous oxide has been used as an oxidizer in closed-cycle rocket engines before, but then they were designed to work that way.
